# libICEpost

Postprocessing of data sampled from internal combustion engines (Experimental, 1D/0D (Gasdyn), 3D (LibICE), etc.)

## Installation

```bash
$ pip install libICEpost
```

## Usage

- TODO

Interactive documentation avaliable at [this page](https://libice-post.readthedocs.io/en/latest/).
